wikipedia_page.main: James Harcourt (27 October 1818 - 1883) was an English organist and composer.

response: *James Harcourt 1880 - 1881 (formerly organist of St Peter Mancroft, Norwich)
* James Harcourt 1851 - 1877 (afterwards organist of Wymondham Abbey 1880 - 1881)
James Harcourt (20 April 187318 February 1951) was an English character actor.
He studied organ under James Harcourt at St Peter Mancroft, and then was apprenticed to Zechariah Buck at Norwich Cathedral.
